sdk.entities.base.entity#

Abstract entity module.

class sdk.entities.base.entity.Entity#

Bases: ModelObj

Abstract class for entities.

Methods

export([filename])

Abstract save method.

from_dict(obj)

Abstract method for creating objects from a dictionary.

save([uuid])

Abstract save method.

to_dict([include_all_non_private])

Return object as dict with all keys.

to_dict_essential()

Return object as dict with some attributes.
